amendment.description: To authorize certain flights by Stage 2 airplanes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3476 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3476 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1876-1878) To authorize certain flights by Stage 2 airplanes.
